Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: E2E Test: Conventional MSP (CLI) tries alone to reconfigure a system parameter (e.g., add a new MSP) that is governed by a policy where explicitly anonymous identities are required
Issue.description: this request should pass - OrgI1 and Org3 clients send a reconfiguration request to add a new MSP -> this request should fail - Org3 and Org4 clients send a reconfiguration request to add a new MSP -> this request should fail >
